price: 30. En voorwaar Wij redden de Kinderen van Israël van een vernederende bestraffing,
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ نَجَّيۡنَا بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ مِنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلۡمُهِينِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: walaqad najjaynā banī is'rāīla mina al-ʿadhābi al-muhīni
